TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CookieHandler extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于读取、编写和删除会话 Cookie 的抽象基类在 HTTP 客服端上。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for reading, writing, and deleting session cookies on an HTTP client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks (SAM) 使用的是实例类来读取、 写入和删除 cookie 的 cookie，或者包含HTTP 客户端上。The (SAM) uses an instance of the class to read, write, and delete the cookie or cookies that contain the on the HTTP client. Cookie （或 cookie，在其中的会话令牌已拆分到多个 cookie 的情况下），该字符串包含令牌被称为会话 cookie 的会话。The cookie (or cookies, in the case where the session token is split across several cookies) that contains the session token is known as the session cookie. Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 附带 cookie 处理程序调用的分块的 cookie 处理由实现类。Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) ships with a cookie handler called the chunked cookie handler that is implemented by the class. 分块的 cookie 处理程序将会话令牌拆分跨根据指定的块区大小的一个或多个 cookie。The chunked cookie handler splits the session token across one or more cookies according to a specified chunk size. 这是为了满足上施加的许多浏览器的各个 cookie 的大小限制。This is to meet size limitations on individual cookies imposed by many browsers. 你可以从派生创建你自己的 cookie 处理程序。You can derive from to create your own cookie handler. 执行此操作时，必须重写， ，和方法来执行实际工作的删除、 读取和编写会话 cookie。When you do so, you must override the , , and methods to perform the actual work of deleting, reading, and writing the session cookie. 这些方法通常读取从 cookie通过集合和写入或删除 cookie集合。These methods typically read the cookie from the collection and write or delete cookies through the collection. 对象通过其可以访问请求和响应提供作为参数传递给上述每种方法。The object through which you can access the request and response is provided as a parameter to each of these methods. 除了所需的方法，你可以选择重写通过公开的其他虚拟方法属性类自定义您的处理程序的行为。In addition to the required methods, you can optionally override other virtual methods properties exposed by the class to customize the behavior of your handler. 多个属性公开的指定默认行为和会话 cookie 的属性的类。Several properties are exposed by the class that specify default behavior and properties for the session cookie. ， ，和属性提供 cookie，它是有效的域并在其下它的存储客户端的路径的基名称。The , , and properties supply the base name for the cookie, the domain in which it is valid and the path under which it is stored on the client. 属性指定是否可以访问客户端脚本的 cookie。The property specifies whether the cookie is accessible to client-side scripts. 属性指定是否应仅通过安全 (HTTPS) 连接传输 cookie。The property specifies whether the cookie should be transmitted only over secure (HTTPS) connections. 如果设置，属性用于设置持久性会话为浏览器关闭后仍保持有效的会话的到期时间。If set, the property is used to set the expiration time for persistent sessions, that is for sessions that remain valid even after the browser is closed. 所有这些属性具有等效属性通常设置的基础"core"方法的处理程序对象 （或对象）。All of these properties have equivalent properties that are typically set on the underlying object (or objects) by the "core" methods of the handler. 有关详细信息请参阅每个属性的文档。For more information see the documentation for each property. 可以通过配置中指定的 cookie 处理程序由 SAM [ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md)元素。The cookie handler that is used by the SAM can be specified in configuration through the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element. 可以在一个事件委托中修改此元素设置的 cookie 处理事件，也可以设置或直接通过属性。The cookie handler set by this element can be modified in an event delegate for the event or it can be set or accessed directly through the property. ## Examples 下面的示例将配置 SAM 若要使用的类型的自定义 cookie 处理`MyNamespace.MyCustomCookieHandler`。The following example configures the SAM to use a custom cookie handler of type `MyNamespace.MyCustomCookieHandler`. ```xml ```

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，删除与指定请求（具有指定名称、域和路径）关联的 cookie。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, deletes the cookie associated with the specified request that has the specified name, domain, and path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从重载调用方法来执行的删除 cookie 的实际工作。Called from the overloaded methods to do the actual work of deleting the cookie. 方法将确保名称和路径都是非空字符串。The methods will ensure that name and path are non-empty strings.

span.para: 你必须重写此方法。实现操作完全取决开发人员。在典型的情况下，实现替换中的指定的 cookie集合中的，同时具有一个 cookie数据和设置早于当前时间; 但是，这不是要求的到期时间。

You must override this method. The implementation is entirely up to the developer. In the typical case, implementations replace the specified cookie in the collection, with a cookie that has data and an expiration time that is set earlier than the current time; however, this is not a requirement.

span.span: if the cookie should be hidden from client script; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制是否在编写处理程序的 cookie 的集 Cookie 标头中发出"HttpOnly"标志。Controls whether the "HttpOnly" flag is emitted in the Set-Cookie header for cookies written by the handler. 某些 web 浏览器通过阻止客户端脚本访问的 cookie 值接受此标志。Some web browsers honor this flag by keeping client-side script from accessing the cookie value. 此属性对应于属性。This property corresponds to the property. 可以通过指定初始化该属性`hideFromScript`属性[ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md)配置中的元素。The property can be initialized by specifying the `hideFromScript` attribute on the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element in configuration.

summary.span: 永久会话的生存期。
如果为零，将始终使用瞬变会话。

span.span: If zero, transient sessions are always used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 票证持久性会话存储在基于文件的 cookie，这意味着后关闭并重新打开 web 浏览器，可以继续在登录会话中。Tickets for persistent sessions are stored in file-based cookies, meaning that the sign-in session may continue after the web browser is closed and reopened. 此属性用于设置属性。This property is used to set the property. 可以通过指定初始化该属性`persistentSessionLifetime`属性[ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md)配置中的元素。The property can be initialized by specifying the `persistentSessionLifetime` attribute on the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element in configuration.

span.span: A value that is less than zero is specified.

summary.span: 读取 Cookie。

value.span: 如果只应针对 SSL 连接使用 cookie，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the cookie should only be used over an SSL connection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制是否有任何已编写 cookie 发出集 Cookie 标头中的"安全"标志。Controls whether the "Secure" flag in the Set-Cookie header is emitted for any cookies written. 如果此值为`true`，cookie 将仅可通过 HTTPS 会话。If this value is `true`, the session cookies will only be available over HTTPS. 此属性对应于属性。This property corresponds to the property. 可以通过指定初始化该属性`requireSSL`属性[ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md)配置中的元素。The property can be initialized by specifying the `requireSSL` attribute on the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element in configuration.

summary.span: 写入 cookie。

The expiration time for the underlying token.

summary.span: 写入当前请求（具有指定值、持久性和过期时间）关联的 cookie，。

span.span: Writes a cookie associated with the current request that has the specified value, persistence, and expiration time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`isPersistent`参数是`false`，cookie 到期时间设置为。If the `isPersistent` parameter is `false`, the cookie expiration time is set to . 如果`isPersistent`参数是`true`，cookie 到期时间设置的值为属性，如果不是`null`或者，如果属性是`null`，过期时间设置为的值`tokenExpirationTime`参数。If the `isPersistent` parameter is `true`, the cookie expiration time is set to the value of the property if it is not `null` or, if the property is `null`, the expiration time is set to the value of the `tokenExpirationTime` parameter. 通过指定的 cookie 名称、 域和路径， ，和属性。The cookie name, domain and path are specified by the , , and properties. 通过指定请求。The request is specified by . 指定是否应仅通过 SSL 发送 cookie属性和应隐藏从客户端脚本的 cookie 的是否由指定属性。Whether the cookie should be sent only over SSL is specified by the property and whether the cookie should be hidden from client-side scripts is specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过指定的 cookie 域和路径和属性。The cookie domain and path are specified by the and properties. 通过指定请求。The request is specified by . 指定是否应仅通过 SSL 发送 cookie属性和应隐藏从客户端脚本的 cookie 的是否由指定属性。Whether the cookie should be sent only over SSL is specified by the property and whether the cookie should be hidden from client-side scripts is specified by the property.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，写入与指定请求（具有指定名称、值、域、路径、过期时间、持久性和可见性）关联的 cookie。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, writes a cookie associated with the specified request that has the specified name, value, domain, path, expiration time, persistence and visibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从重载调用方法来执行与编写 cookie 的实际工作。Called from the overloaded methods to do the actual work of writing the cookie. 方法将确保`value`非空字节数组，而且`name`和`path`是非空字符串。The methods will ensure that `value` is a non-empty byte array and that `name` and `path` are non-empty strings.

span.para: 你必须重写此方法。实现操作完全取决开发人员。在典型的情况下，实现将 cookie 数据写入集合，但是，这不是一项要求。大多数参数的方法通常用于设置一个或多个等效属性对象。

You must override this method. The implementation is entirely up to the developer. In the typical case, implementations write the cookie data to the collection, however, this is not a requirement. Most parameters of the method are typically used to set equivalent properties on one or more objects.
